data.text: I am like [MET] a flower/rose from the Sharon Plain,
And among the other men, you, the man who loves me, are like [MET] an apple/fruit tree that grows in the forest.
You led me to the ◄banquet room/room where we could make love►,
Refresh me and strengthen me with your lovemaking
Put your left arm under my head
I hear the voice of the man who loves me.
like [SIM] a deer or a gazelle.
He spoke to me and said,
flowers are blooming throughout the country/land.
There are young/new figs on the fig trees,
You are like [MET] a dove that is hiding far from me in an opening/crack in the rocky cliff.
There are other men who are like [MET] little jackals/foxes that ruin vineyards;
You who love me, I belong to you and you belong to me,
You who love me, come and be like [SIM] a gazelle or like a young deer on the hills of Bether,
